Class CustomFieldItem

java.lang.Object
  com.episodic.platform.client.response.query.Item
      com.episodic.platform.client.response.query.CustomFieldItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CustomFieldItem
extends Item

Represents a single custom field that can be set on an episode or playlist.

See Also:
